Room.Name: Rum Road South
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the southern end of Rum Road, the only road in the village.
Room.LongDescription: Wagons are pulled up to the double doors of the old wooden building, and great barrels and kegs stand everywhere. Some are empty, but most appear to be full of rum. All of the workmen you see are dwarves, but for the most part they simply ignore you. On the east side of the road is the Red Dog Saloon, one of the most popular places in the village.
